name: The laboratory where the future is already a yesterday thing
name_original: The laboratory where the future is already a yesterday thing
description:
You were invited to the secret lab to test the drone with cutting edge pathfinding technology. You are promised that at the end of the experiments you will get paid with a large amount of money. Solve puzzles involving the smart drone to succeed and reach the end. 

Drone can sometimes will clip through walls, don’t ask about it. It’s game design. Bruh.

This game is a submission to Wowie Jam 4.0.
